p: The ADME study was carried out using SwissADME ( http://www.swissadme.ch). It is a free web-based tool to evaluate the pharmacokinetics, drug likeness and pharmacochemistry of small molecules [ 27, 28]. The bioactivity prediction study was carried out using PASS (Prediction of Activity Spectra for Substances) online ( http://www.pharmaexpert.ru/passonline/) software. PASS online tools has the ability to predict over 4000 kinds of biological activities and pharmacological effects, and was used in this study to check the bioactivity score of the compounds [ 29].
